value:
The Heroes are very strong. There
are many brave beorc and laguz.

War is sad. Fixing things without
fighting is much better.

You want to see all of Mordecai's
strength? Then Mordecai will not
hold back. Come!

Are you not going to try sumo? You
should. It feels good to work hard
and sweat, $Nu.

King Caineghis and King Tibarn would
be very good at sumo. Challenging
opponents for Mordecai!

Do not be afraid. Mordecai is here to
tell you about the festival of flames
at $Nf's castle.
Winning is fun. Mordecai is strong!

Are you hurt? I did not mean to get
carried away...
I am too hungry for this...

Mordecai grows more strong each
day. Train, train, train!

A festival of strength? And no one
will be hurt? Mordecai will enjoy this!

Conflict is bad. People get hurt...
people cry. There are no winners.$k$pSometimes we have to fight. But it
always makes me sad.$k$pBut this festival is fun! We can fight at
full strength, and no worrying.$k$pLosing a match is not a problem.
We are all winners anyway. We all
get to be happy.$k$pWe should make Askr like this all the
time, $Nu.$k$pIf you are fighting for that, then you
can always count on Mordecai.
Grrrrrr!
I will throw you!
Must fight more...
Mordecai never loses!
You are strong...
Festivals are good. Lots of fun!
You seek a match with Mordecai? Mordecai accepts!
Sumo is not the killing kind of fighting. That is why it is good.
The clothes look good, but are not very warm.
Fighting is hungry work. When do we eat?
Friendly contests are a good way to show strength. Wish we could settle everything this way.
You can always count on Mordecai.
OK!
Say again?
Rrrgh!
